full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS RDO RJE MI 'KHRUGS PA LHA DGU LA BRTEN PA'I SMYUNG BAR GNAS PA'I CHOG SDIG SGRIB MUN 'JOMS NGAN SONG 'DREN BYED BYIN RLABS 'OD KYI ZHAGS PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015A *, ,CES BCOM LDAN 'DAS RDO RJE MI 'KHRUGS PA LHA DGU LA BRTEN PA'I SMYUNG BAR GNAS PA'I CHOG SDIG SGRIB MUN 'JOMS MAN SONG 'DREN BYED BYIN RLABS 'OD KYI ZHAGS PA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SKYES PA'I RABS DU MAR RGYAL BASTAN 'DZIN PA'I SMON LAM GYI MTHU LEGS PAR GRUB PA AIL GO SANG AER TE NI MKHAN PO NO MON HANG RIN CHEN RDO RJE NAS BSKUL MA MDZAD PA LTAR, BDAG MDUN GYI SKOR JE GUNG THANG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYI GSUNG LTAR BKOD CING SMYUNG GNAS KYI CHO GA GZHAN LAS KYANG CUNG ZAD KHA BSKANG TE, ^BTZUN PA WAG'INDRA PAtU SIDDHIS KHU RE CHEN MOR BSGRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI SHES RAB KYI MIG DANG LDAN PA SHES RAB RGYA MTSO'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BSTAN RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,
